title: BACnetUnconfPrivateTransfer (Function)
text:
FUNCTION BACnetUnconfPrivateTransfer :
IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Sends a UnconfirmedPrivateTransfer request.
Sends a BACnet Unconfirmed-Private-Transfer service request to invoke proprietary or
non-standard service in a remote device.
return IEC_BACNET_STATUS

rows.Name: pSourceAddress
rows.Comment:
If the BACnet application has only one device constructed and installed, this can
be NULL. In this case the MAC address of this device will be used. Otherwise this
shall be the MAC address returned on device object construction.

rows:
This is the MAC address of the device to which the request
should be sent.

A pointer to the service information data structure. This data structure is to
transport the service parameters to the destination device.
